author: bridge-bot
content:
<timbeiko> @fede_intern your last few messages are stretching the definition of "friendly" competition ðŸ˜„

It's one thing for you to disagree with the approaches taken, and you're welcome to propose better ones, but IMO we should avoid trivializing others' work or calling it useless. You said yourself we should do our best to make Ethereum better and keeping this channel high signal and fun for people to engage in is one of the simple but very impactful ways to do this!
